net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing
Class License

java.lang.Object
  net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.License
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public final class License
extends Object
implements Serializable, Cloneable

This is the license object, which is serialized and signed to a file for use by the application later. All the object fields are immutable and final so as to prevent modification by reflection.

This object is not created directly. For instructions on creating licenses, see the documentation for License.Builder.

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.6.0
Author:
Nick Williams
See Also:
License.Builder, License.Feature, Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
static class License.Builder
          This class is responsible for all license creation.
static class License.Feature
          A class that represents a licensed feature.

serialize

public byte[] serialize()
Serialized this license into a byte array that can be shipped electronically.

Returns:
a serialized form of this license.

deserialize

protected static License deserialize(byte[] data)
Deserializes a serialized license into an actual License object.

Parameters:
data - The serialized data to create the license from
Returns:
the unserialized license.

getProductKey

public final String getProductKey()
Returns the product key for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.

Returns:
the product key.

getIssuer

public final String getIssuer()
Returns the issuer of this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.

Returns:
the license issuer.

getHolder

public final String getHolder()
Returns the holder of this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.

Returns:
the license holder.

getSubject

public final String getSubject()
Returns the subject for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.

Returns:
the license subject.

getIssueDate

public final long getIssueDate()
Returns the millisecond timestamp for the issue date of this license.

Returns:
the date this license was issued.

getGoodAfterDate

public final long getGoodAfterDate()
Returns the millisecond timestamp for the date after which this license is valid (usually equal or close to the issue date, but this is not required.)

Returns:
the date after which this license is valid.

getGoodBeforeDate

public final long getGoodBeforeDate()
Returns the millisecond timestamp for the date before which this license is valid (i.e., the expiration date).

Returns:
the date before which this license is valid (and after which it has expired).

getNumberOfLicenses

public final int getNumberOfLicenses()
Returns the number of licenses/seats/users that this license is valid for.

Returns:
the number of licenses this represents.

getFeatures

public final ImmutableLinkedHashSet<License.Feature> getFeatures()
Returns an immutable (unchangeable) list of all of the features contained within this license. For more information on features see License.Feature and License.Builder.

Returns:
a list of all of the licensed features.
See Also:
License.Feature

hasLicenseForFeature

public final boolean hasLicenseForFeature(String featureName)
Checks if the feature specified is licensed. If the feature is licensed and has an expiration, ensures that the feature is not expired based on the current date before returning true.

Parameters:
featureName - The feature to check
Returns:
true if this feature is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

hasLicenseForFeature

public final boolean hasLicenseForFeature(long currentDate,
                                          String featureName)
Checks if the feature specified is licensed. If the feature is licensed and has an expiration, ensures that the feature is not expired based on the provided date before returning true.

Parameters:
currentDate - The date (millisecond timestamp) to check the feature against
featureName - The feature to check
Returns:
true if this feature is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

hasLicenseForAnyFeature

public final boolean hasLicenseForAnyFeature(String... featureNames)
Checks if all of the features specified are licensed in this license. If any one feature is licensed, this method returns true. Any features that contain expiration dates are checked against the current date. Features are only valid if they have no expiration date or they are not expired.

Parameters:
featureNames - The features to check
Returns:
true if any one feature listed is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

hasLicenseForAnyFeature

public final boolean hasLicenseForAnyFeature(long currentDate,
                                             String... featureNames)
Checks if all of the features specified are licensed in this license. If any one feature is licensed, this method returns true. Any features that contain expiration dates are checked against the current date. Features are only valid if they have no expiration date or they are not expired.

Parameters:
currentDate - The date (millisecond timestamp) to check features against
featureNames - The features to check
Returns:
true if any one feature listed is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

                                             FeatureObject... features)

Returns:

hasLicenseForAllFeatures

public final boolean hasLicenseForAllFeatures(String... featureNames)
Checks if all of the features specified are licensed in this license. If any one feature isn't licensed, this method returns false. Any features that contain expiration dates are checked against the current date. If any one feature is expired, this method returns false.

Parameters:
featureNames - The features to check
Returns:
true if every feature listed is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

hasLicenseForAllFeatures

public final boolean hasLicenseForAllFeatures(long currentDate,
                                              String... featureNames)
Checks if all of the features specified are licensed in this license. If any one feature isn't licensed, this method returns false. Any features that contain expiration dates are checked against the provided date. If any one feature is expired, this method returns false.

Parameters:
currentDate - The date (millisecond timestamp) to check features against
featureNames - The features to check
Returns:
true if every feature listed is licensed and valid, false otherwise.

hasLicenseForAllFeatures

public final boolean hasLicenseForAllFeatures(FeatureObject... features)
Checks if all of the features specified are licensed in this license. If any one feature isn't licensed, this method returns false. Any features that contain expiration dates are checked against the current date. If any one feature is expired, this method returns false.

Parameters:
features - The features to check
Returns:
true if every feature listed is licensed and valid, false otherwise.
